title: Probability Theory and Related Fields
summary: Probability Theory and Related Fields is a peer-reviewed mathematics journal published by Springer. Established in 1962,[1] it was originally named Zeitschrift f√ºr Wahrscheinlichkeitstheorie und verwandte Gebiete, with the English replacing the German starting from volume 71 (1986).[2] The journal publishes articles on probability. The journal is indexed by Mathematical Reviews and Zentralblatt MATH. Its 2019 MCQ was 2.29, and its 2019 impact factor was 2.125.
